name: Car Con Calamity: Aviation Humiliation
description:
Only a Windows build is supplied unfortunately.

14 minutes till time is over as of writing this.

Sadly didn't have time for:

-better level design

-audio support

-wasm build

-posting source code (it's very bad)

Although in the end it wasn't about making a good game. It was about making a game in the first place.

I didn't have much rust experience and almost no bevy experienc prior to this project. It was quite the learning experience but now I know what to avoid doing in the future. This is honestly some of the worst code I've written in my life.
